metadata.title: CVE-2019-17578 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Dolibarr 10.0.2. It has XSS via the "outgoingemail setup" feature in the admin/mails.php?action=edit URI via the "Senderemail for automatic emails (default value in php.ini: Undefined)" field.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
